Hey Kyle,

May be research on the topic of kenjutsu itself will
help. In my research on the Shimazu clan, I've had to
try a number of research techniques. Like Shimazu
Clan, Satsuma Province, Kagoshima, Ryukyu,
Kyushu,Satsuma Rebelion, Iriki-in Clan and so on.

Hell I've found so realy good information by
researching Korean history ie: the Korean Wars of the
1590's.


--- Kyle Segall <klancesegall@...> wrote:
> I've tried that, but I haven't found anything
> definitive yet.
> 
> --- In samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com, jacob gerhard
> 
> <madbearscave@y...> wrote:
> > Kyle,
> > 
> > May be looking up information on the Mori Clan
> will
> > aid you in your search. 
> > 
> > Jake

> > > I know that Satsuma han's premier kenjutsu ryu
> was
> > > Jigen ryu, but 
> > > was there a predominant ryu in Choshu han? I've
> > > looked 
> > > through "Choshu in the Meiji Restoration", but
> > > didn't see anything
